publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-305 Fergus Ewing: Shopmobility Highland—That the Parliament congratulates Shopmobility Highland on reaching its fifth birthday and recognises the invaluable service which it has provided over this period providing for disabled people’s access to shops in Inverness and more recently in Dingwall; notes that Shopmobility Highland now has around 3,200 registered users, and pledges support for its continued success and secure funding to ensure that disabled people can enjoy the access to shops which is taken for granted by other people.

S1M-305 Fergus Ewing: Shopmobility Highland—That the Parliament congratulates Shopmobility Highland on reaching its fifth birthday and recognises the invaluable service which it has provided over this period providing for disabled people’s access to shops in Inverness and more recently in Dingwall; notes that Shopmobility Highland now has around 3,200 registered users, and pledges support for its continued success and secure funding to ensure that disabled people can enjoy the access to shops which is taken for granted by other people. Supported by: Michael Matheson*
S1M-305 Shopmobility Highland (lodged on 18 November 1999) Andrew Wilson*, Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-305 Shopmobility Highland (lodged on 18 November 1999) Maureen Macmillan*, Rhoda Grant*, Trish Godman*

Supported by: Michael Matheson, Andrew Wilson, Alasdair Morgan, Maureen Macmillan, Rhoda Grant, Trish Godman
S1M-305 Shopmobility Highland (lodged on 18 November 1999) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-305 Shopmobility Highland (lodged on 18 November 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
